journey.description1: My passion for technology started when I was young and continues to grow as the years go by. What began as a hobby became an obsession — not just writing code, but creating something that can improve lives. As a software engineer, what I find fulfilling is solving tough problems and turning ideas into reality and making them work. For me, code isn't just a line of text on a monitor; it's figuring out how to make tools that enable people to succeed.
journey.description2: I am a do-it-and-learn and try-out kind of person. From diving into a new paradigm, experimenting with a tool, or tweaking a side project, I am always looking for ways to learn and improve. Beyond the screen, some of my interests include gaming, hiking, and going to music festivals with friends.
journey.description3: Right now I focus on full-stack design, using modern tech to make ideas shine. Building apps that do more than just run, they’re smooth to use — and made to be fun.
journey.title: My Journey

projects.description: A showcase of proffesional work across various industries

50five_app.description: Mobile app for managing, finding, and filtering 420,000+ EV charging stations across Europe. Includes charge point management features, real-time status updates, and remote control for operators. Focused on intuitive UX, fast search, and scalable infrastructure.
50five_app.title: 50five Mobile App

operations_dashboard.description: Automated system for real-time monitoring and automatic resetting of EV charge stations on error. Includes event logging, filtering, and instant operator feedback.
operations_dashboard.title: Operations Dashboard

build_at_home.description: Web app connecting schools worldwide to share and collaborate on projects. Built in an international team, focused on global knowledge exchange.
build_at_home.title: Build at Home

portfolio.description: Personal portfolio site showcasing projects and skills. Built from scratch with modern, responsive design and interactive animations.
